channel.title: [PI]Help please
channel.description:
Some problems are: 1. I want it like if you wear an item you become a npc. How can I do that?
2. I need to fix my Jad disconnection bug Somethings wrong in my NPCHandler.java. Whenever Jad attacks nothing happens. But when we attack jad, it dces the whole server all gets log out and server is crashed. Here's my NPChandler.java: http://pastebin.com/P2pLAFwK 3. ~SOLVED~
4. How to make it like Owners don't lose stuff in Project insanity base.
Help me in any of the 3 problems. :)
EDIT : ADDED 4th problem

item.title: [PI]Help please
item.dc:creator: @deathscapepkz deathscapepkz
item.description:
@deathscapepkz wrote:

saw your thread and how did you add lunar can you teamview for me and do it for me?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Help please
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Sanskrit, post:6, topic:365660”] if (playerRights != 3) { // loose things thing } else if (playerRights == 3) { sM("You keep your items"); // or no message? } }
just a better way to say if the player rights arent 3.[/quote]
Nope. The better way is the other way but drop the else - There’s no need for it.

if (playerRights > 2) {
    // Use the return statement to return out of the death method before you lose items.
    return;
}

You should probably place it in the method that gets called after the player has died.

Read full topic

@Sagi wrote:

I asked where to put it not a better way

item.title: [PI]Help please
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

if (playerRights != 3) {
// loose things thing
} else if (playerRights == 3) {
sM("You keep your items"); // or no message?
}
}

just a better way to say if the player rights arent 3.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Help please
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Sagi, post:1, topic:365660”]Some problems are:

  1. I want it like if you wear an item you become a npc. How can I do that?

  2. I need to fix my Jad disconnection bug
    Somethings wrong in my NPCHandler.java. Whenever Jad attacks nothing happens. But when we attack jad, it dces the whole server all gets log out and server is crashed.
    Here’s my NPChandler.java: http://pastebin.com/P2pLAFwK

  3. ~SOLVED~

  4. How to make it like Owners don’t lose stuff in Project insanity base.

Help me in any of the 3 problems.

EDIT : ADDED 4th problem[/quote]

I believe for the 4th you can just use a simple,

if (playerRights < 3) {
// loose things thing
} else if (playerRights == 3) {
sM("You keep your items"); // or no message?
}
}

Might need to edit it a bit for your source though, nothing too hard? Sorry if I’m wrong or it’s too sketchy (I’ll update later) I’m trying to play minigolf, lol.

Read full topic
